text: geu go-eul-ui baegseongdeul-i mid-eum-eul gajgo hananim-eul gong-gyeonghayeossdamyeon ha nanim-eun geudeul-eul wihae haneulgwa ttang-eu lobuteo chugbog-eul yeol-eo jueoss-eulila geuleona geudeul-eun jinlileul geoyeoghaess-eunihananim-eun geudeul-i eod-eun geos-eulo mal miam-a geudeul-eul as-a gassnola
